METHOD.description: Encryption method, default(table), the following methods are supported: aes-128-cfb, aes-192-cfb, aes-256-cfb, cast5-cfb, des-cfb, rc4-md5-6, rc4, table, and not recommend: bf-cfb, rc4-md5, chacha20, salsa20.

PASSWORD.description: A password used to encrypt transfer.

PORT.description: Clients need to connect to this port.
